description: Framework for improving critical infrastructure cybersecurity

controls.title: Organizational cybersecurity policy
controls.description: Organizational cybersecurity policy is established and communicated

controls.title: Cybersecurity roles and responsibilities
controls.description: Cybersecurity roles and responsibilities are coordinated and aligned with internal and external stakeholders

controls.title: Asset vulnerabilities
controls.description: Asset vulnerabilities are identified and documented

controls.title: Cyber threat intelligence
controls.description: Cyber threat intelligence is received from information sharing forums and sources

controls.title: Identity management
controls.description: Identities and credentials are issued, managed, verified, revoked, and audited for authorized devices, users and processes

controls.title: Access permissions and authorizations
controls.description: Access permissions and authorizations are managed, incorporating the principles of least privilege and separation of duties

controls.title: Audit/log records
controls.description: Audit/log records are determined, documented, implemented, and reviewed

controls.title: Network monitoring
controls.description: The network is monitored to detect potential cybersecurity events

controls.title: Personnel activity monitoring
controls.description: Personnel activity is monitored to detect potential cybersecurity events

controls.title: Response plan execution
controls.description: Response plan is executed during or after an incident

controls.title: Notifications from detection systems
controls.description: Notifications from detection systems are investigated

controls.title: Recovery plan execution
controls.description: Recovery plan is executed during or after a cybersecurity incident
